room_title: Escape room "Detention" by Armadillo Escape Room Adventures in Houston
review: We did the Detention room. At first, we thought it was going to be more kid base and a little too easy... but let me tell you I was wrong! The room was challenging and kept our attention the entire time, in fact, I wish we had an extra 20 min!

room_title: Escape room "Detention" by Armadillo Escape Room Adventures in Houston
review: Did the detention room with 5 kids. It was fantastic. Kids had a blast. It was really difficult and made the kids really work and think. Kids keep asking to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Detention" by Armadillo Escape Room Adventures in Houston
review: We have done many escape rooms in the area and this was by far the most challenging and very well thought out. We did the Detention room and can't wait to come back to do the others!
